name: Trinity General School
startIntroPart1: Long ago, we were many schools with one similarity: hatred towards aggressive barbarians of Gehenna Academy. We solved our issues and coordinated our efforts during tea parties, and one day we decided to unite. We uphold the traditions of founding schools, thus every faction is semi-autonomous, but we will stand as one lest we perish alone. Thanks to trading policies, we became the richest great school in Kivotos.
startIntroPart2: I stand before thee, oh three presidents of Tea Party, from factions Pater, Filius and Sanctus. May thy wisdom and worth guide us. May thy faith enlighten our path. May we become the last standing.
attacked: Filthy barbarians think they can overrun us. To arms!
introduction: We, Tea Party, greet thee. Would you like to join us for this cup of tea?
neutralHello: Greetings, may the God bless thee.
neutralLetsHearIt: We see you would like to offer us something. Proceed, please.
neutralNo: After discussing this matter, we have to decline your offer.
neutralYes: After discussing this matter, we agreed to accept your offer.
hateLetsHearIt: What is that you were going to say, scum?
afterPeace: The slaughter is over, we shall be leaving.
tradeRequest: We have prepared a deal to you, would you agree?

name: Gehenna Academy
startIntroPart1: Gehenna prospers in its freedom and chaos, for the chaos is the key to progress. Our Academy is one of the oldest, but as old as we are, so is our rivalry with Trinity General School. Seriously, how can they be so high and mighty, so obsessed with discipline? They are stagnant losers who will eventually fail.
startIntroPart2: Great Leader Hanuma Makoto, will you try to bring order to this school or direct its chaos to crush its foes? Will you manage to pace along with Millennium or fall like Abydos? Time will show us if your golden statue was worth it...
declaringWar: The war time has come to you!
attacked: Huh? Is that a mistake you made? Well, I will make sure it was the last mistake!
introduction: Hello there. I am Great Leader Makoto of the Gehenna Academy's Pandemonium Society. Ome day I will rule everything!
neutralLetsHearIt: Ho-ho! You would like to make offer?
neutralNo: Ibuki didn't like this offer and I am solidary with her!
neutralYes: How sweet, I will take it!
hateHello: Ugh, it's you... Wish these outlaws killed you on the way here...
hateLetsHearIt: Okay, I, Great Makoto, allow you to spill it out. I am sure it is some nonses though.
hateNo: Nonsense it is, now get outta here!
afterPeace: Okay, now I think we have better problems to solve.
tradeRequest: Hey! Will you accept the deal from the Great Makoto?
uniques: [+3 Happiness, +2 Culture, +1 Production] [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Arius Branch School
startIntroPart1: Long ago, we were many schools with one similarity: hatred towards aggressive barbarians of Gehenna Academy. We solved our issues and coordinated our efforts during tea parties, and one day they decided to unite. But we refused, we didn't want to be one, grey mass. And they betrayed us, turned their weapons against us. Arius burned, and was erased from history.
startIntroPart2: ...But we live! We will have our vengeance that comes in flaming hatred! And you, Madame Beatrice, shall guide our efforts with your iron fist. Vanitas Vanitatum et Omnia Vanitas!
attacked: You have made a colossal mistake...
introduction: Hello. Madame has considered you undeserving of her presence, so I will watch the diplomacy by her name.
neutralLetsHearIt: Is that what I think it is?..
tradeRequest: Here's the deal. By the day, don't you mind we are terrorists?
uniques: [+75]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[-100]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Abydos High School
startIntroPart1: Abydos is the oldest running school in all Kivotos, our influence can still be noticed in other Great Schools. Legacy of Abydos is truly vast as we keep discovering new and new sites with ancient relics. But after Desertification that started 7 years ago, Abydos District got mostly covered in sand and its economics crumbled, people started to flee, students ceased to enroll and banks demand insane debts to be returned...
startIntroPart2: Will we manage to rise after such fall? Will we regain control and enforce order and stability across this wasteland? TAKANASHI HOSHINO, WAKE UP! I AM BRIEFING YOU!
declaringWar: I tried it to be the easy way. Now we do this a hard way.
defeated: ...Huh. Is that it?.. Guess I have more time to nap then...
introduction: Eh? Hello-hello~! Who might you be, hm?.. I am Takanashi Hoshino, president of Abydos Independent High School...
neutralLetsHearIt: Oh?.. Are you interested in investing in Abydos economics by any chance?..
hateLetsHearIt: What are you going to offer?
tradeRequest: Mmm... Trading, exchanging... How exhausting!.. Here's my deal...
